thread.title: Axiomtek Launches the GOT812LR-834, a 12.1" IP66-Rated Stainless Steel Touch Panel PC
thread.title_full: Axiomtek Launches the GOT812LR-834, a 12.1" IP66-Rated Stainless Steel Touch Panel PC - PR.com

author: PR.com
title: Axiomtek Launches the GOT812LR-834, a 12.1" IP66-Rated Stainless Steel Touch Panel PC
text:
Axiomtek Launches the GOT812LR-834, a 12.1" IP66-Rated Stainless Steel Touch Panel PC
Axiomteks GOT812LR-834, a 12.1" XGA (SVGA) TFT IP66-rated stainless steel fanless panel PC with Intel® Atom Processor E3827, M12 connectors, and high-brightness LCD.
City of Industry, CA, September 01, 2015 --( PR.com )-- Axiomtek, one of the world's leading designers and manufacturers of innovative, high performance and reliable PC-based industrial computer products, is proud to announce the launch of the GOT812LR-834, a high-brightness 12.1-inch stainless steel panel computer for harsh environments.
The ruggedized GOT812LR-834 featuring fanless and noiseless design supports a wide operating temperature range from -20°C to +55°C (-4°F to +131°F). This all-in-one industrial stainless touch panel PC supports the low power consumption Intel® AtomTM processor E3827 at 1.75 GHz and supports maximum memory capacity up to 8 GB. The GOT812LR-834 is an excellent human machine interface platform for applications in the following operational environments: marine, food factories, steel mills, gas pumps, outdoor information kiosks, and point of sale terminals.
To meet different application needs, GOT812LR-834 has rich expandability interfaces with M12 connectors, including two COM ports (RS-232/422/485), two USB 2.0 ports, and one Gigabit Ethernet port. It offers two LCD options: one is a 12.1-inch XGA TFT LCD with 1000 nits brightness and a low reflection resistive (GOT812LR-834) and the other one is SVGA TFT LCD with 500 nits brightness (GOT812L-834). Additionally, two PCI Express Mini Card slots are available for wireless network connections.
“Axiomtek’s new GOT812LR-834 has a stainless steel type 316, IP66-rated enclosure and five M12 I/O connectors for protection against water and dust,” said Debbie Tu, product manager for Axiomtek’s Product Marketing Division. “Its sunlight readable technology with high brightness 1000 nits color display and low reflective touch screen allows the screen to be legible even under direct sunlight. Also, it supports a 9V – 36V wide-range DC power input. This robust stainless panel unit is best suited for extreme humidity, dusty or wet spaces. It is also great for outdoor applications.”
The GOT812LR-834 is available now. Axiomtek provides a wide array of IoT & M2M industrial systems and boards. For more product information or pricing, please visit our website at us.axiomtek.com or via Facebook, Twitter and YouTube. Please contact one of our sales representatives at solutions@axiomtek.com.
Main Features
- Stainless steel design for food factories, point of sale terminals, and other outdoor applications
- 12.1" XGA TFT LCD with 1,000 nits (GOT812LR-834)
- 12.1" SVGA TFT LCD with 500 nits (GOT812L-834)
- Fanless cooling system with Intel® AtomTM Processor E3827 at 1.75 GHz
- Water and dust-proof M12 connectors are IP66-rated
- One 2.5” SSD and one CFastTM socket
- Two USB 2.0 ports and two COM ports (RS-232/422/485)
- Dual PCI Express Mini Card slots
- IP66-sealed enclosure for whole system
- Wide range of -20°C to +55°C (-4°F to +131°F) operating temperature
About Axiomtek Co., Ltd
Axiomtek Co., Ltd. is one of the world's leading designers/manufacturers of PC-based industrial computer products. From its roots as a turnkey systems integrator specializing in data acquisition and control systems, Axiomtek has mirrored the PC evolution in various industries by shifting its focus toward the design and manufacture of PC-based industrial automation solutions.
Axiomtek Co., Ltd. established in 1990, has more than 60 distributor partners globally. Axiomtek offers Industrial PCs (IPC), Single Board Computers and System on Modules (slot CPU card, small form factor embedded boards & SoM), Fanless & Rugged Embedded System (eBOX, tBOX and rBOX), Industrial Firewall & Industrial IoT Gateway, Touch Panel Computers (TPC), Medical PCs (MPC), Human Machine Interface (HMI), Digital Signage Players (DS), Industrial Network and Network Appliances (NA).
As an associate member of the Intel® Internet of Things Solutions Alliance, Axiomtek continuously develops and delivers cutting edge solutions based on the latest Intel® platforms.
